participant_1.background:
Others will want to come to my garden and enjoy the flowers.
i like drinking expensive wine.
I love to watch movies, even though it's not the most productive use of my time.
I work out vigorously to keep in shape and avoid eating vegetables that I dislike, which my parents are unaware of.
I loved riding horses with my father when I was a child.

participant_2.background:
I'm from the Midwest, where we drive big trucks and have big hands.
i like the color red.
i love sunny days.
i love to clean.
I enjoy long drives in the countryside and sometimes I spot my neighbour's pool boy.

content.text: Hey, it's nice to meet you too!
Red, it's so vibrant and exciting.
That's a great color, I love red too! I also love sunny days, they always put me in a good mood.
Me too! I love spending time outdoors on sunny days, especially when it's warm.
I love gardening, I find it very relaxing. I'm trying to grow a beautiful garden that others will want to come and enjoy.
That's so nice, I'm sure you'll do a great job! I love riding horses, I used to do it all the time when I was a kid.
That's so cool! I've never ridden a horse, but it's always seemed like a fun experience.
It's a lot of fun, you should definitely try it sometime.
I'll have to look into it! Thanks for the recommendation.
You're welcome! It was nice talking to you.
You too, have a nice day!
